# scale-list-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                            | Type      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `index`   | `index`   | Index number, useful only for styling the `ordered` type (not used currently)          | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `marker`  | `marker`  | If `false`, no marker or left padding will be visible                                  | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `ordered` | `ordered` | Whether this is a child of an ordered scale-list, gets set automatically by its parent | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `styles`  | `styles`  | (optional) Injected jss styles                                                         | `any`     | `undefined` |
